InstallationÂ¶

OpenDelta is tested on on Python 3.8 and Pytorch 1.9.

pip install opendelta

or from the source

git clone
cd OpenDelta
python setup.py install

If you want to do some modifications on the code for your research, run

git clone 
cd OpenDelta
python setup.py develop
